amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate that the programs authorized under the Crime Identification Technology Act of 1998 to improve the justice system will be fully funded at the levels authorized for each of the fiscal years 2004 through 2007.

vote.text: Amendment SA 355 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 355 proposed by Senator DeWine. (consideration: CR S4370; text: CR S4370) To express the sense of the Senate that the programs authorized under the Crime Identification Technology Act of 1998 to improve the justice system will be fully funded at the levels authorized for each of the fiscal years 2004 through 2007.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 355 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 355 proposed by Senator DeWine.
